@ ALL - Please LOGIN (create an account if you do not have one) and click the [+] symbol beside QUALITY at top of page for ALL torrents you DL from 20-40.  It makes a difference; shows you care and that his work is appreciated for the genius that it is! Don't forget to seed back at least 1/1...

Be Cool !
Sorry.  I am new at this and noone to show me anythig, so I didn't know about clicking the + mark.  Would have done it before.

Hey twentyforty: WTF?

A 720p rip of Raging Bull..? Good movie, but NOT worth 720p. Even Star Wars, Star Trek, etc. are barely worth 720p. I don't want 90% of my processor power being sucked up to play a friggin movie. (and i'm on a dual core 3GHz machine--a slower machine won't even play it smoothly).

Please get a frickin clue. Thanks.

Hey michaelrwatson:

Are you actually complaining about a high quality torrent someone made, as a service to you?  Are you insane?

You deserve to be slapped.
